post.title: Hello ZeroNet!
post.body:
Here is my customary "Hello World" post for this fun thing called ZeroNet.

I'm [Marty McGuire](https://martymcgui.re/), a developer that works on the centralized web and an enthusiast for the decentralized web.

I'm not sure yet what I'll be using this space for, but it is just so darn easy to set up that I couldn't help myself.

So, hello, ZeroNet. Let's make stuff together!!
